comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Silva Tipple New married her professor, Kirsop Lake (1872-1946), an English-born Anglican priest who emigrated to the US during WWI to teach early Christian literature and ecclesiastical history at Harvard. She was his second wife; they had a son together. The Lakes founded and edited a series of monographs about the history of New Testament text. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kirsopp_Lake
